description: Fishing vessel details for partnered fishing

hull_number.description: The external markings of the vessel. NLD2+: XR, GBR: PXR

rss.description: The RSS identification code for the vessel. GBR: GBRPRSSNO

cfr.description: The code of federal regulation for the vessel. GBR: PIR

call_sign.description: The international radio call sign for the vessel. GBR: PRC

flag_state.description: Flag state of vessel registration. NLD2+: FS, GBR: PFS

name.description: The name of the vessel. NLD3+: NA, GBR: PNA
